price: Basi subiri kwa subira njema.Hakika wao wanaiona iko mbali!
footnotes: Basi, ewe Muhammad! Subiri uwastahamilie hizo kejeli zao, na kuhimiza kwao adhabu, kwa subira isiyo kuwa na mbabaiko ndani yake wala mashtaka.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
